user.title: Bradford White Wave Authentication
user.description:
Please authenticate with Bradford White to allow Home Assistant to access your water heater.

1. Click [here]({auth_url}) to open the login page.
2. Log in with your Bradford White account.
3. After logging in, you will need to retrieve a redirect URL from the browser's developer tools network tab, see [Authentication Guide](https://github.com/gclenaghan/ha-bradford-white-wave?tab=readme-ov-file#authentication). (it should start with `com.bradfordwhiteapps.bwconnect://`).
4. Paste the URL below.
